chat_room

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • chat_room.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    Constitutes a connection (usually between a client and the server. However an end point can send messages to itself using a connection to itself). Both the server and each client hold their own instance of the connection.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Create a new connection
